pli-tv-prv2.12:1.1: Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-prv2.12:1.2: Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ pañcahi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
pli-tv-prv2.12:1.3: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā saṃghādisesāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe…. #1
pli-tv-prv2.12:2.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-prv2.12:2.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
